item.title: Piri Piri Prawns
item.description: Ingredients 400g prawns (200g per person) 2-3 lemons (zest and juice) Piri piri chilli oil Olive oil Smoked paprika Peanut butter Butter White wine Creme fraise English parsley Steps Clean the prawns and dry them.
